name: Winter alert
description:
Comrade,

Our psionic weapon test failed with catastrophe All battle bears fell into rage and attack our nearby forces. Now they are comming to "SibIssPsi" Institute!

Your mission is to defend the Institute. I gave you full control of the Institute and nearby military posts. Battle groups are waiting for your orders.

Don't mess up, Comrade! Defend our Motherland!

Controls:
Move camera with mouse or WASD, zoom with wheel. No more actions, just relax and enjoy kalinka stuff with beautiful soviet march
